Guy Bomanyama-Zandu (amụrụ na 22 Nọvemba 1972) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri si DRC.

A mụrụ Guy Bomanyama-Zandu na Kinshasa na 22 Nọvemba 1972.
Na ngwụsị afọ 1980, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Brussels, nweta nwa amaala Belgium.
O bu ụzọ mụọ elektrọnik, wee mee ihe nkiri na Institut de radioélectricité et de cinématographie (INRACI) na Brussels, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2000.
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Papa Mobutu (2000) na INRACI
A họpụtara ya maka Namur Francophone Film Festival
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri ya niile gosipụtara na Afrika Film Festival à Louvain en Belgique
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ INRACI Bomanyama-Zandu malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, Ateliers de Production des Films du Congo (APFC), nke a na-akpọzi Zandu Films, nke dị na Kinshasa na Brussels
N'afọ 2001, o mere ihe nkiri na Gbadolite, bụbu ebe siri ike nke Mobutu Sese Seko na mpaghara DRC, nke Jean-Pierre Bemba mechara chịkwaa

Ihe nkiri ahụ dekọrọ akaebe banyere arụrụala ndị agha Mobutu mere, na ndị agha si Chad na Uganda.
A manyere ya ịhapụ ihe nkiri a n'aka ndị ọrụ nchekwa Bemba.

N'afọ 2003 Bomanyama-Zandu mere Congo je te pleure, ihe nkiri nkeji iri ise na anọ n'etiti Zandu Movies Brussels na Zandu Movies sprl, nke ọ tọrọ ntọala n'afọ ahụ na Kinshasa, ọ bụkwa ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe mbụ nke Mịnịstrị nke Omenala Congo nabatara

Emere ihe nkiri a site na mmekorita nke Radio na Television nke mba Congo ma ndị Mịnịstrị nke Omenala Congo kwadoro ya.
Ihe nkiri a dị n'etiti oge ọchịchị na Congo nke oge a, na-ekpughe ndị Congo na-eto eto na oge akụkọ ihe mere eme ha nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ha amaghị.
Bomanyama-Zandu kere Mayasi, Taximan a Kinshasa na 2004, na usoro ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na-ahụ maka nchebe na nkwalite ihe nketa ihe nkiri Congo
